ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 568
ygData.msgSnippet: I think I just got extremely lucky. for about a week s time whenever I or a friend zoned to Steamfont the Hero would pop shortly after. They always let me loot
ygData.messageBody:
I think I just got extremely lucky. for about a week's time whenever I or a
friend zoned to Steamfont the Hero would pop shortly after. They always let
me loot the shackle because I could easily do the quest with Carrillon. I
ended up doing the quest about 7 times in a week. I think Steel Warriors
love me by now.

-Sartori D'Elsiraad <The Companions>
Bard of Quellious of the 50th Chorus
-Stace Stormraven
Druid of Tunare of the 26th Circle
Veeshan Server
